attributes.action: Allow Motorcycles to use bus lanes in norwich
attributes.additional_details:
A taxi and a bus can share the lane with a pedal cyclist, then motorcyclists should have the right to safely travel in a spacious lane, too.

Norwich is extremely congested. Road lanes like that on Grapes Hill are now tighter than before with the additional bus lane..
The above should also apply to bus gates too.

Holland has a great system for motorcyclists and pedal cyclists alike and their policies should be influencing the way we move two wheeled vehicles in and around Norwich/Norfolk

As a small, but busy city, with severe congestion around both inner and outer ring roads and 1.5bn being spent on road upgrades by the government, what better city to run at least a pilot scheme?

This would encourage more people to ride further through the year.
